author: andschwa
body:
This updates .NET CLI to build 1540 (highest common denominator of 1.0.0 available across all platforms) and the .NET packages to the latest rc3-23826 build.

We needed to add the `System.Threading.Thread` package to `System.Management.Automation`, and remove the `DataTable` stub from Core PowerShell, hence this requires PowerShell/psl-monad#25.

This also tested the cache invalidation of the CI machines.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: sweet. Do we need to force-update `dotnet cli` on dev machines?

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @vors Probably not, but I just track 1.0.0 locally.

title: Bump packages
